channel.title: PI If npc is dead give points
channel.description: [code=java] if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].isDead && Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 1771) { //Replace #### with npc ID c.Quest1 += 1; //Replace #### with name of your points i.e. slayerPoints }[/code] What's wrong with that code? I want it to go from Quest1 = 1 to Quest1 = 2 and where do I put the code?
